verses.verse: Elihu<WH453> also continued,<WH3254> and said,<WH559>
"Bear<WH3803> with me a little,<WH2191> and I will show<WH2331> you;<WH4405> for I still have something to say on God<WH433>'s behalf.
I will get<WH5375> my knowledge<WH1843> from afar,<WH7350> and will ascribe<WH5414> righteousness<WH6664> to my Maker.<WH6466>
For truly<WH551> my words<WH4405> are not false.<WH8267> One who is perfect<WH8549> in knowledge is with you.<WH1844>
"Behold,<WH410> God is mighty,<WH3524> and doesn't<WH3988> despise anyone.<WH3524> He is mighty in strength<WH3581> of understanding.<WH3820>
He doesn't<WH2421> preserve the life of the wicked,<WH7563> but gives<WH5414> to the afflicted<WH6041> their right.<WH4941>
He doesn't<WH1639> withdraw his eyes<WH5869> from the righteous,<WH6662> but with kings<WH4428> on the throne,<WH3678> he sets<WH3427> them forever,<WH5331> and they are exalted.<WH1361>
If they are bound<WH631> in fetters,<WH2131> and are taken<WH3920> in the cords<WH2256> of afflictions,<WH6040>
then he shows<WH5046> them their work,<WH6467> and their transgressions,<WH6588> that they have behaved themselves proudly.<WH1396>
He also opens<WH1540> their ears<WH241> to instruction,<WH4148> and commands<WH559> that they return<WH7725> from iniquity.<WH205>
If they listen<WH8085> and serve<WH5647> him,<WH3615> they shall spend their days<WH3117> in prosperity,<WH2896> and their years<WH8141> in pleasures.<WH5273>
But if they don't<WH8085> listen, they shall perish<WH5674> by the sword;<WH7973> they shall die<WH1478> without knowledge.<WH1847>
"But those who are godless<WH2611> in heart<WH3820> lay up<WH7760> anger.<WH639> They don't<WH7768> cry for help when he binds them.<WH631>
They<WH5315> die<WH4191> in youth.<WH5290> Their life<WH2416> perishes among the unclean.<WH6945>
He delivers<WH2502> the afflicted<WH6041> by their affliction,<WH6040> and opens<WH1540> their ear<WH241> in oppression.<WH3906>

Yes,<WH5496> he would have allured you out of distress,<WH6310> into a broad place,<WH7338> where<WH8478> there is no restriction.<WH4164> That which is set<WH5183> on your table<WH7979> would be full<WH4390> of fatness.<WH1880>
"But you are full<WH4390> of the judgment<WH1779> of the wicked.<WH7563> Judgment<WH1779> and justice<WH1779> take hold of you.<WH8551>
Don't<WH5607> let riches entice<WH5496> you to wrath,<WH2534> neither let the great<WH7230> size of a bribe<WH3724> turn you aside.<WH5186>
Would your wealth<WH7769> sustain<WH6186> you in distress,<WH1222> or all the might<WH3581> of your strength?<WH3581>
Don't<WH7602> desire the night,<WH3915> when people<WH5971> are cut off in their place.<WH5927>
Take heed,<WH8104> don't<WH6437> regard iniquity;<WH205> for you have chosen<WH977> this rather than affliction.<WH6040>
Behold,<WH410> God is exalted<WH7682> in his power.<WH3581> Who is a teacher like him?<WH3384>
Who has prescribed<WH6485> his way<WH1870> for him?<WH559> Or who can say, <WH6466> 'You have committed unrighteousness?<WH5766>'
"Remember<WH2142> that you magnify<WH7679> his work,<WH6467> whereof men<WH582> have sung.<WH7891>
All men<WH120> have looked<WH2372> thereon.<WH120> Man sees<WH2372> it afar off.<WH7350>
Behold,<WH410> God is great,<WH7689> and we don't<WH3045> know him.<WH4557> The number of his years<WH8141> is unsearchable.<WH2714>
For he draws up<WH1639> the drops<WH5198> of water,<WH4325> which distill<WH2212> in rain<WH4306> from his vapor,<WH108>
Which the skies<WH7834> pour down<WH7491> and which drop<WH5140> on man<WH120> abundantly.<WH7227>
Yes,<WH995> can any understand the spreading<WH4666> of the clouds,<WH5645> and the thunderings<WH8663> of his pavilion?<WH5521>
Behold,<WH6566> he spreads his light<WH216> around him.<WH3680> He covers the bottom<WH8328> of the sea.<WH3220>
For by these he judges<WH1777> the people.<WH5971> He gives<WH5414> food<WH400> in abundance.<WH4342>
He covers<WH3680> his hands<WH3709> with the lightning,<WH216> and commands<WH6680> it to strike the mark.<WH6293>
Its noise<WH7452> tells<WH5046> about him,<WH4735> and the livestock also concerning the storm that comes up.<WH5927>
